<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/playlists/6LiYBpS5DE9PQEMDhYzHOc/tracks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add one or more items to a user's playlist.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **playlist-modify-public**, **playlist-modify-private**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"position":{"type":"number","example":0},"uris":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"spotify:track:1s2FsIDYlX6nhQ6UXF4V2w"},"example":["spotify:track:1s2FsIDYlX6nhQ6UXF4V2w","spotify:track:14gQ7SmMZeeEC3YAPB5vFw","spotify:track:4iV5W9uYEdYUVa79Axb7Rh"]}}},"examples":{"Add Items to Playlist":{"value":{"position":0,"uris":["spotify:track:1s2FsIDYlX6nhQ6UXF4V2w","spotify:track:14gQ7SmMZeeEC3YAPB5vFw","spotify:track:4iV5W9uYEdYUVa79Axb7Rh"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
